title: [BUG] NUGET compatibility Issue for net8.0-ios18.0.
body:
Cancel/close this issue!

Nevermind - this is a NON-ISSUE.  The "SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.iOS" is a "transitive package" which automatically gets included when I select 3.119 for "SkiaSharp" main package.
===================


### Description

We tried to migrate our iOS/Android app from SkiaSharp 2.89 to 3.119 today, but ran into an issue where it won't show us the "SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.iOS" option for 3.119, which appears to be caused by our app targeting ".net8.0-iOS18" while this package support is only labeled for ".net8.0-iOS17".

If we try to manually force install it from the PkgMgr Console, it yields rejects it here too for the same reason.

We'd rather not roll back our whole project to iOS 17, for sake of SkiaSharp, as we are supposing here that this is just a meta-data fix to make this work.

So this issue is two-fold:
1st: Want to make sure our assumption is correct, that the current "SkiaSharp.Native.iOS" package is all set for iOS18.

and

2. Would like to have the package compatibility updated to allow for iOS 18.


### Code

n/a

### Expected Behavior

Expect:  iOS18 compatible support

### Actual Behavior

Actual: Only support up to iOS17 currently.

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.116.0 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.9 (Previous)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

iOS

### Platform / Operating System Version

iOS 18

### Devices

_No response_
